channel.title: [562/659] A couple things
channel.description:
1) How do I add a Point System Basically what I want it to do is, when I kill a NPC, it will give me a certain amount of points, which I could use these points on a special shop.
2) Fulling Inventory? Basically want I am asking is, when I click on, buy 50, it says, not enough inventory space. How do I make it so when I click the 50, it will just fill my inventory.
3)Adding Fishing So I put my fishing spots in the place I want them to be, when I click on them it will say something like, You need a harpoon to fish here. I will get a harpoon, but then nothing will happen when I click on the fishing spot again. How do I make it so it will give me the fish and Xp.
4) Adding a custom Dungeoneering Mini-game What i wanted was to have certain NPC's that I can kill, so that when I kill them I will get dungeoneering xp, and dungeoneering points.
5)Items Wielding Wrong so ive been adding different items and for some reason a one handed weapons will be wielded as a two handed weapon. How do i make it one handed like it should?
sorry if these questions are very "noobish" I am fairly new to coding and I am trying to get all the help I could get.

item.title: [562/659] A couple things
item.dc:creator: @skate_ah skate ah
item.description:
@skate_ah wrote:

  1. How do I add a Point System
    Basically what I want it to do is, when I kill a NPC, it will give me a certain amount of points, which I could use these points on a special shop.

  2. Fulling Inventory?
    Basically want I am asking is, when I click on, buy 50, it says, not enough inventory space.
    How do I make it so when I click the 50, it will just fill my inventory.

3)Adding Fishing
So I put my fishing spots in the place I want them to be, when I click on them it will say something like, You need a harpoon to fish here.
I will get a harpoon, but then nothing will happen when I click on the fishing spot again.
How do I make it so it will give me the fish and Xp.

  1. Adding a custom Dungeoneering Mini-game
    What i wanted was to have certain NPC’s that I can kill, so that when I kill them I will get dungeoneering xp, and dungeoneering points.

5)Items Wielding Wrong
so ive been adding different items and for some reason a one handed weapons will be wielded as a two handed weapon. How do i make it one handed like it should?

sorry if these questions are very “noobish”
I am fairly new to coding and I am trying to get all the help I could get.
